definition: The German word "Tourismussektor" refers to the specific sector or industry that encompasses various activities related to tourism. It is commonly used to describe the economic sector that involves businesses, organizations, and services associated with travel, hospitality, and leisure.

examples.german: Der Tourismussektor ist ein wichtiger Wirtschaftszweig in Deutschland.
examples.english: The tourism sector is an important industry in Germany.

examples.german: Der Tourismussektor hat in den letzten Jahren stark zugenommen.
examples.english: The tourism sector has grown significantly in recent years.
The tourism sector provides many job opportunities.

examples.german: Der Tourismussektor ist eng mit der Hotellerie verbunden.
examples.english: The tourism sector is closely linked to the hotel industry.

examples.german: Der Tourismussektor leidet unter den Auswirkungen der COVID-19-Pandemie.
examples.english: The tourism sector is suffering from the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic.
